summary: This mod adds a new follower to the game called Ian-Still needs work and is in beta stages! Help appreciated
descriptionHtml:
Ok so my first mod ever! i\'m completely new to the creation kit and i just attempted this last night.Oh and please ONLY constructive criticism!

Alright so this follower focuses mainly on magical healing spells. (atleast he should) So he\'s a good followr to to heal you up.

Location:Bannered Mare Whiterun

Mods used: Robert\'s Body mod. All credit goes to him for the appearance of my follower\'s body. 

Update 1: I FINALY fixed it.....i think.... Well it works for me tell me if u have any issues. I was also able to get the requirment out of the way so nothing is needed to install :D.
P.S. Follower may be naked when u first meet him. I gave him an outfit to wear not sure if it equipped right.
author: bdumbly1
